projects.name: Facetome
projects.description: A dynamic social media platform that enables users to share content, engage with others, and build a network through interactive features like posts, likes, comments, and user following.

projects.name: Messagely

projects.name: Seekandspot (Where is Waldo)
projects.description: A full-stack interactive game where users identify and tag specific characters or items within an image. Inspired by games like “Where’s Waldo?”, the app challenges users to find hidden elements, testing both memory and observation skills.
